thread.title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania: Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt's quirky antics steal the show in 'Aashiq Surrender Hua' | Zee News
thread.title_full: Badrinath Ki Dulhania: Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt's quirky antics steal the show in 'Aashiq Surrender Hua' | Zee News

title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania: Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt's quirky antics steal the show in 'Aashiq Surrender Hua' | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood stars Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt have not only charmed the audience with their adorable chemistry in the upcoming release 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' but also their dance moves haves impressed cinema lovers. The filmmakers on Friday unveiled the latest song 'Aashiq Surrender Hua' online and, here, the duo seems to have stolen the show once again. 
'Aashiq Surrender Hua' has been sung by ace vocalists Amaal Mallik and Shreya Ghoshal. The lyrics has been penned by Shabbir Ahmed on the tunes of Amaal. The video is quirky enough to make you shake a leg. 
Watch for yourself: 
This is the third time that this lovable duo will be seen sharing screen space. 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' marks the second instalment of a franchise that began with 'Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania'. MUST READ 
The Shashank Khaitan directorial is scheduled for release on March 10 this year. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 16:44 More from zeenews
